owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

collectProtocolFees(address,address,uint.notice: Collects the protocol fee accrued in the given currency, called by the owner or the protocol fee controller

grantPausableRole(address).notice: Grant the pausable role to an account, called by the owner

pause().notice: Pause the contract, called by the owner or an account with the pausable role

protocolFeesAccrued(address).notice: Given a currency address, returns the protocol fees accrued in that currency

revokePausableRole(address).notice: Revoke the pausable role to an account, called by the owner

setProtocolFee((address,address,address,.notice: Sets the protocol's swap fee for the given pool

setProtocolFeeController(address).notice: Update the protocol fee controller, called by the owner

unpause().notice: Unpause the contract, called by the owner
